紨字的基本解释

紨
fū
布。
粗绸。

紨
fù
古同“缚”。

紨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fū］
［《廣韻》芳無切，平虞，敷。］
(1)布名。
(2)指细布。
(3)粗绸。
[②]［fù］
［《集韻》符遇切，去遇，奉。］
同“縛1”。
捆绑东西的绳索。

紨字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　紨； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页919第18
【廣韻】【集韻】?芳無切，音敷。【說文】布也。一曰粗紬。【博雅】綐紬也。【玉篇】績也，續也，亦緟也。【類篇】大絲曰紨。　又人名。【前漢·武五子傳】長孫女羅紨。　又【集韻】馮無切，音扶。義同。　又【集韻】符遇切，音附。繩也。或作縛。

紨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
紨字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
紨
fū
cloth.

紨

Gu Tong "bound".
紨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fū］
["Guangyun" Fang Wuqie, Pingyu, Fu. ]
(1) Cloth name.
(2) Refers to fine cloth.
(3) Crude silk.
[②]［fù］
["Jiyun" Fu Yuqie, Quyu, Feng. ]
Same as "Binding 1".
The rope that binds things.
紨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　紨; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 919 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fang Wuqi, sound compression. [Said the text] Bu also. One said rough. [Bo Ya] 綐紬也. [Jade articles] The performance is also, the continuation, and the 緟 also. 【Classes】The big silk says 紨.　Another name. [Previous Han·Wu Wuzi Biography] The eldest granddaughter Luo Yan.　[Jiyun] Feng Wuqie, Yinfu. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Fu Yuqie, with sound attached. Rope also. Or tied.
